mapper.update: update oa_plan_assert_month set assert_id = #{assertId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assert_name = #{assertName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_total_num = #{yearTotalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bought_num = #{boughtNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_num = #{planNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, assert_id, assert_name, year_total_num, bought_num, plan_num, unit_price, remark, create_time, update_time from oa_plan_assert_month where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
